attributes.action: overall the decision made today to allow the murderer of Philip Lawrence to remain in this country and not to return him to his home country, Italy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Philip Lawrence lost his human rights when he was murdered, so why should his murderer have a human right to remain in this country.  He should be deported to his own country, where he would soon learn to speak the language.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
